sentences.sContent: She tells me that if the religious scholars say so, she will engage in Moslem operations: suicide attacks.
sentences.sContent_eng: She tells me that if the religious scholars say so, she will engage in Moslem operations: suicide attacks.
sentences.sCn: 她告诉我如果宗教学者希望他们那么做，她也将义无反顾的采取穆斯林的反抗活动—自杀攻击。

sentences.sContent: The Buddhist, the Christian, the Moslem, and the Jew may all get answers to their prayers, in spite of the enormous differences among their stated beliefs.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Buddhist, the Christian, the Moslem, and the Jew may all get answers to their prayers, in spite of the enormous differences among their stated beliefs.
sentences.sCn: 佛教徒、基督教徒、伊斯兰教徒和犹太教徒，尽管他们所宣称的信仰有极大的不同，但是，他们的祈祷大概都能得到回应。

synos.tran: 穆斯林的；伊斯兰教的；回教的
穆斯林；伊斯兰；穆罕默德信徒

trans.tranCn: 穆斯林的；伊斯兰教的；回教的
穆斯林；穆罕默德信徒；伊斯兰
